Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Anthology | Discovery/Science | Educational | Family
Status: Returning Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Sundays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: August 07, 2011

The Questions of Life is the television component of the CURIOSITY project, first announced in September 2009. The television series is a multiyear project engaging the foremost experts in academia and the preeminent producers of nonfiction content to answer the fundamental questions and underlying mysteries of our time. Twelve hour-long episodes-each addressing a different question-will premiere per season, over the course of five years. The first season will premiere on Discovery Channel in February 2011 on Sundays at 8:00 PM. The series also will feature a global presence, eventually airing across Discovery networks in over 170 countries around the world.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Curiosity)
